work experience.translation[0].definitio: a system in which a student can work for a company in order to learn about a job, or the period during which a student does this
Ella is about to do work experience with a clothing manufacturer.
work experience.translation[1].definitio: the experience you have had of working in a particular type of job
She’s well qualified but has no relevant work experience.
a period of time that a young person spends working in a particular place, as a form of training
Why do I have to do work experience?
The teenagers spend two weeks on work experience in local businesses.
work experience.translation[2].definitio: a short period of time during which a young person works for a company in order to learn about a job and about working life in general
Shell is working on projects to help find training and work experience for some of Brazil’s 13 million street children.
